overview: Three friends plan to start a business of capturing ghosts using a strange instrument. The instrument has been received by one of the friends as the legacy of his grandfather. After getting the instrument they decide to turn as ghost hunters and earn money. But things changed when most of their lies turn out to be true and both the living and the dead chase them for answers. And from here series of the comedy of errors begin to change their lives forever.
title: Bhootchakra Pvt. Ltd.
